name: Formatting Multiple Strings
description:
WHY IS THERE NO SPACES!?!

Format given strings. Should handle large amounts of parameters. Handle non-string types by returning `None`.
### Examples
```python
solution(' ','323','85948','informationdata') -> '323 85948 informationdata'
solution('[','putridwaste','&^&^3','weir934','5u49') -> 'putridwaste[&^&^3[weir934[5u49'
solution(1,'323','85948') -> None
solution([],[]) -> None
solution() -> None
```
